version_description:
운동 계획들을 소개드립니다!!
귀하의 목표를 달성하기 위해서는 어떤 운동이 필요한지 알아보는 시간입니다. 귀하께서는 날씬한, 빠른, 또는 강한 몸을 만들기를 원하실 수 있으며 여기, 저희 트레이너들이 그렇게 하실 수 있도록 도와드겠습니다.

Introducing: Workout Plans!
- Simply select your goal, "Leaner", "Fitter" or "Stronger"
- Select your current fitness level (beginner, intermediate, advanced)
- Think no more.. Just follow along with workouts designed specifically to help inspire and motivate you to reach your goals.
- Each plan takes you through 3 workouts per week, for 6 weeks
- Our trainers guide you with exercises and tips, and you control the workout days to fit your schedule

We've also given our UI a major overhaul to get quicker access to what is important to you.
WORKOUTS: Access our classic individual workouts and discover new beginner, sports specific, goal oriented and other focused workouts.
PLANS: Have our trainers help you every step of the way
CUSTOM: Build you own customized workouts just right for you
MY SWORKIT: Track you progress, beat your personal best.

If you love what you see, please let everyone know with an awesome review. If you have any issues, let us know and we'll make it right!

Happy Sworking!

Introducing: Workout Plans!
- Simply select your goal, "Leaner", "Fitter" or "Stronger"
- Select your current fitness level (beginner, intermediate, advanced)
- Think no more.. Just follow along with workouts designed specifically to help inspire and motivate you to reach your goals.
- Each plan takes you through 3 workouts per week, for 6 weeks
- Our trainers guide you with exercises and tips, and you control the workout days to fit your schedule

We've also given our UI a major overhaul to get quicker access to what is important to you.
WORKOUTS: Access our classic individual workouts and discover new beginner, sports specific, goal oriented and other focused workouts.
PLANS: Have our trainers help you every step of the way
CUSTOM: Build you own customized workouts just right for you
MY SWORKIT: Track you progress, beat your personal best.

If you love what you see, please let everyone know with an awesome review. If you have any issues, let us know and we'll make it right!

Happy Sworking!

Our trainers have made some awesome improvements to the workouts in your Leaner, Fitter, and Stronger plans for all levels.

We've also made technical improvements to the Apple Watch to help you get the very best workout possible.

As your trainer, we're here for you. Please let us know how we can help and let's keep working together to help you become the fittest you possible.

We've made it even easier to build and edit your custom workouts with our new and improved Sworkit Workout Builder.

Our Sworkit Workout Builder is like telling a trainer exactly what you want to achieve and what your current limitations might be.

- "I need easier exercises to start because it's been a while since I worked out."
- "I need something low impact because of an old knee injury and I also don't want to wake my neighbors."
- "I want toned abs and glutes but I can't lay on the floor."

Difficulty | Impact Level | Body Part Focus | Exercise Category | Stance

We take favorites to a whole new level. Sworkit is the only app where you can build new workouts, customize existing workouts, and even share the workouts you made with friends. Create a custom list of workouts that you love.

Plan it, Build it, Organize it – Sworkit!

NEW: Filter exercises by noise level when building your perfect workout to keep your neighbors and roommates happy :)

5.4.0
Our Sworkit Workout Builder is like telling a trainer exactly what you want to achieve and what your current limitations might be.

- "I need easier exercises to start because it's been a while since I worked out."
- "I need something low impact because of an old knee injury and I also don't want to wake my neighbors."
- "I want toned abs and glutes but I can't lay on the floor."

Difficulty | Impact Level | Body Part Focus | Exercise Category | Stance

We take favorites to a whole new level. Sworkit is the only app where you can build new workouts, customize existing workouts, and even share the workouts you made with friends. Create a custom list of workouts that you love.

Plan it, Build it, Organize it – Sworkit!

Having a plan is the key to success and meeting your goals. You can now schedule your next workout from the congrats screen when you finish a workout.

People who schedule their next workout have been 75% more likely to succeed in completing their next workout. We’re here for you, make it happen.

Having a plan is the key to success and meeting your goals. You can now schedule your next workout from the congrats screen when you finish a workout.

People who schedule their next workout have been 75% more likely to succeed in completing their next workout. We’re here for you, make it happen.

With thousands of people completing their workout plans each day, we've now made it easier to reset your progress to start a plan over for anyone who loved their workout plan so much they want to do the same one again.

Go ahead and think about when you can do your next workout. Having a plan ensures you will succeed. Get to Swork.

We've made improvements to make sure that Sworkit is always the simplest and smartest way to get a workout in.

Has Sworkit made a major impact on your fitness goals? We're looking to add to our success stories to share with other users to hopefully encourage them towards the same successes. If you are interested in sharing, email us at stories@sworkit.com

We've made improvements to make sure that Sworkit is always the simplest and smartest way to get a workout in. We've also ensured compatibility for iOS11.

Has Sworkit made a major impact on your fitness goals? We're looking to add to our success stories to share with other users to hopefully encourage them towards the same successes. If you are interested in sharing, email us at stories@sworkit.com

Thanks for choosing Sworkit as your simplest way to get a workout in whenever you need it. We're challenging our community to do at least 3 workouts per week for the rest of the year. Are you in?

This update includes fixes for Apple Watch workouts and other improvements to keep Sworkit fit too.

Sworkit is on a mission to help everyone build a fitness habit, no matter how hard that has been for anyone in the past. This update introduces 24 brand new exercises to help you in that journey.

Just a few examples include Dynamic Downward Dog and Cat & Cow Sequences for more dynamic warm-ups, Clam Shells and Donkey Kicks to work those glutes, as well as Bear Crawls and Grapevines to get you moving.

This updates also includes full support for iPhone X, and improvements to warm-ups.

Don’t wait until 2018, start your new years habit today!

Sworkit is on a mission to help everyone build a fitness habit, no matter how hard that has been for anyone in the past. This update introduces 24 brand new exercises to help you in that journey.

Just a few examples include Dynamic Downward Dog and Cat & Cow Sequences for more dynamic warm-ups, Clam Shells and Donkey Kicks to work those glutes, as well as Bear Crawls and Grapevines to get you moving.

This updates also includes full support for iPhone X, and improvements to warm-ups.

Sworkit users just like you are completing over 30,000 workouts per day. Whether you are following one of our 6 week plans, choosing individual workouts, or even making your own with our custom workout builder, we're hard at work each day to make sure you have the best experience possible.

This update includes bug fixes for Apple Watch syncing, warm-ups, and our 30 day January challenge.

We'd love to hear how Sworkit is helping make a difference in your life. Send us your story at stories@sworkit.com

We're excited to announce that you can now sync your Sworkit workouts directly to Strava. Sworkit is the go to bodyweight workout app for beginners and athletes alike.

Giving you the power to sync your workouts directly to Strava's social network for athletes means you can stay connected with you friends and training partners.

To celebrate we've also added three new workouts to our Sports Conditioning section which everyone can access today.
- HIIT for Athletes
- Core Strength for Athletes
- Dynamic Mobility Warm-up

Let us know how you are using Sworkit by sending an email to stories@sworkit.com

We've added three new workouts to our Sports Conditioning section:
- HIIT for Athletes
- Core Strength for Athletes
- Dynamic Mobility Warm-up

Let us know how you are using Sworkit by sending an email to stories@sworkit.com

Like a sauna, things are getting hot and refreshing inside Sworkit. We’ve given ourselves a mini-makeover (Yoga crow pose pic for the aspirational win!), and we’ve dropped a brand spankin’ new August monthly challenge into the app to make up for the fact this month has absolutely no holidays (what gives, August?). Below are a few more technical improvements we’ve made as well:

• Watch Activity Syncing: What time is it? Time to enhance your wrist. This update helps ensure watch workouts will sync and track more consistently within the app.

• 3rd Party Advertising: Three’s a crowd when it comes to ads. No one wants their sweat-fest interrupted by advertisers, so we’ve removed all 3rd party ads from our app. Now it’s just you, Sworkit, and the other 30 million on our #SworkTeam. You know, the way workouts were meant to be.

Enough about us, what have you been up to? We want to know how you Sworkit. Send us an email at stories@sworkit.com and let us know where, when, or how you workout with Sworkit. Or just say, hi. We could always use more friends. We also promise to read each one #pinkyswear.

We’ve dropped in a brand new September monthly challenge. Are you game?

What have you been up to? We want to know how you Sworkit. Send us an email at stories@sworkit.com and let us know where, when, or how you workout with Sworkit. Or just say, hi. We could always use more friends. We also promise to read each one #pinkyswear.
Minor updates here and there. Smashed bugs, repaired pixels - that sort of thing.
Minor updates here and there. Smashed bugs, repaired pixels - that sort of thing.
Minor updates here and there. Smashed bugs, repaired pixels - that sort of thing.

Sworkit has undergone a mini-makeover. We've made a bunch of big (and small) updates to make your 2019 sworkouts even better.

While a lot of the work we've done to the app is behind-the-scenes, below we've included a few of the highlights you're sure to notice:
- We've updated the custom workout builder to make it even easier to build your perfect workout
- We redesigned the post-workout experience to make it super shareable
- You'll now be able to preview the exercises on any of the Plan workouts (bye burpee surprise!)
- And your Strava and MyFitnessPal workouts sync from any device

Note: Our Watch app has been temporarily removed but will be back very soon!

If you have any questions, want to provide feedback, or to just to say 'hi', reach out to us in app by going to "Help Center" > "Contact Support"

We look forward to an amazing 2019 with you!

Sworkit has undergone a mini-makeover. We've made a bunch of big (and small) updates to make your 2019 sworkouts even better.

While a lot of the work we've done to the app is behind-the-scenes, below we've included a few of the highlights you're sure to notice:  - We've updated the custom workout builder to make it even easier to build your perfect workout - We redesigned the post-workout experience to make it super shareable - You'll now be able to preview the exercises on any of the Plan workouts (bye burpee surprise!) - And your Strava and MyFitnessPal workouts sync from any device
Note: Our Watch app has been temporarily removed but will be back very soon!
If you have any questions, want to provide feedback, or to just to say 'hi', reach out to us in app by going to "Help Center" > "Contact Support"
We look forward to an amazing 2019 with you!

We made a few changes to our Sworkit app in preparation for exciting new features coming in 2019. Some of these changes caused a few bugs. Below is the latest bug squash report.

Fixed:
- Too many warm-ups in a workout
- Total yoga workout length time
- Custom workouts not playing rest breaks
- MyFitnessPal syncing glitches
- Multiple issues with workout settings not functioning as desired during workouts
- Fixed syncing issues with large workout logs, e.g. 3000+ workouts (yes, we have amazing members with that many workouts)
- An issue with planned workouts not being marked incomplete

Release 9.0.4 includes:
- Enhanced instructional audio cues explaining how to perform each exercise that can be turned on or off
- An updated custom workout builder
- A redesigned post-workout experience to make it super shareable
- The ability to sync Strava and MyFitnessPal workouts from any device

Note: Our Apple Watch app has been temporarily removed but will be back soon.

If you have questions, want to provide feedback, or to just say ‘hi’, reach out to us via the app by going to “Help Center” > “Contact Support”

We made a few changes to our Sworkit app in preparation for exciting new features coming in 2019. Some of these changes caused a few bugs. Below is the latest bug squash report.

Fixed:
- Apple Health syncing calories
- Some plan workouts missing cooldowns

Note: Our Apple Watch app will still be coming back soon

If you have questions, want to provide feedback, or to just say ‘hi’, reach out to us via the app by going to “Help Center” > “Contact Support”

We made a few changes to our Sworkit app in preparation for exciting new features coming in 2019. Some of these changes caused a few bugs. Below is the latest bug squash report.

Fixed:
- Custom workouts for all supported languages
- Fixed shuffle
- Fixed workout streak

Note: Our Apple Watch app will still be coming back soon

If you have questions, want to provide feedback, or to just say ‘hi’, reach out to us via the app by going to “Help Center” > “Contact Support”

Sworkit is giving you the keys to customize your workout audio experience the exact way you want.

- Disable specific prompts to have more or less audio from Sworkit

If you have questions, want to provide feedback, or to just say ‘hi’, reach out to us via the app by going to “Help Center” > “Contact Support”

You asked and we listened!
* You can now choose a male or female voice for your trainer
* You can reset your completed plan, or choose another plan to continue your training
* Finish your workout, snap a post-sworkout selfie and share your workout stats

Bugs Fixed
* Fixed custom workouts freezing if you didn't have any exercises
* Fixed intervals changing mid-workout
* Fixed change sides happening at the wrong time
* Fixed custom workouts not playing rest breaks
* Fixed planned workouts done longer than the suggested time
* Fixed first rest-break showing too early

2019 is officially in swing and we are heating up the first half of March with some fire new features, updates, and helpful bug fixes in your favorite fitness app.

What's New:
- Kettlebell workouts: The long-awaited small equipment workout series has begun starting with kettlebells
- Workout Complete: You can now mark monthly challenge workouts as complete both automatically and manually
- Monthly Memberships are back: Sign up for a monthly subscription for $14.99 or an annual subscription for $89.99. Both options include a 7-day free trial
- Yoga: Choose the length of your pose in "Workout Settings" and choose how many rounds you'd like to complete

What's Improved:
- Change sides: This is now working as it should on on warm-ups
- Custom workout filters is now working for all languages
- Workout Streak: If you have a lot of workouts your streak number is now corrected
- "Smart shuffle": Left/Right side-based exercises are functioning intelligently

See something that needs some polish or a full on fix? Reach out to support@sworkit.com and let us know. We guarantee a real human will respond back and address your feedback.

We look forward to hearing from you!

The world's best fitness app just added kettlebell workouts and a new collection of workouts for runners!

What's New:
- Kettlebell workouts: The long-awaited small equipment workout series has begun starting with kettlebells
- Runner's Series: Improve your running performance with 6 new supplemental workouts for runners.
- Workout Complete: You can now mark monthly challenge workouts as complete both automatically and manually
- Monthly Memberships are back: Sign up for a monthly subscription for $14.99 or an annual subscription for $89.99. Both options include a 7-day free trial
- Yoga: Choose the length of your pose in "Workout Settings" and choose how many rounds you'd like to complete

What's Improved:
- Change sides: This is now working as it should on on warm-ups
- Custom workout filters is now working for all languages
- Workout Streak: If you have a lot of workouts your streak number is now corrected
- "Smart shuffle": Left/Right side-based exercises are functioning intelligently

See something that needs some polish or a full on fix? Reach out to support@sworkit.com and let us know. We guarantee a real human will respond back and address your feedback.

We look forward to hearing from you!

With the best custom workout builder in the game, we've made sure to keep it running in top form.

Bug squashed:
- We fixed a "filter by" issue in our Exercise Library

You can reach us at support@sworkit.com with questions or feedback. We guarantee a real human will respond. We look forward to hearing from you!

Sworkit version 9.1.3 is putting the "fun" back in functionality. Check out our latest features and fixes:

What's New:
- Offline Functionality: That's right, you can now sworkout even if there's no network connection
- Apple Watch pairing: Track your Sworkit sweat sesh's on your Apple Watch

What's Improved:
- Warm-up exercises being incorrectly added to the middle or end of a workout is fixed
- Dumbbell filter errors when adding to custom workout builder is fixed
- You can now see the download progress of exercise assets (video, images, audio)

Sworkit version 9.1.4 is putting the "fun" back in functionality. Check out our latest features and fixes:

What's New: - Offline Functionality: That's right, you can now sworkout even if there's no network connection - Apple Watch pairing: Track your Sworkit sweat sesh's on your Apple Watch
What's Improved: - Warm-up exercises being incorrectly added to the middle or end of a workout is fixed - Dumbbell filter errors when adding to custom workout builder is fixed - You can now see the download progress of exercise assets (video, images, audio)

- Apple Watch pairing: Track your Sworkit sweat sesh's on your Apple Watch

- You can now see the download progress of exercise assets (video, images, audio)

We’re singing “Let It Go” in honor of Sworkit version 9.1.6 which fixes some pesky frozen app issues. Read on for more details:

What’s Improved:
- A fix for video crashes and frozen app issues near the end of certain workouts

If you have a question about this latest release, a support issue we can help you with, or if you simply want to give us feedback, send an email to support@sworkit.com. Our Customer Support and Tech Heroes are happy to assist you.

We’re singing “Let It Go” in honor of Sworkit version 9.1.7 which fixes some pesky frozen app issues. Read on for more details:

What’s Improved: - A fix for video crashes and frozen app issues near the end of certain workouts
If you have a question about this latest release, a support issue we can help you with, or if you simply want to give us feedback, send an email to support@sworkit.com. Our Customer Support and Tech Heroes are happy to assist you.

Sworkit version 9.2.0 is helping you make fitness a habit with streaks, stats, and sounds. Read on to learn more.

What's New:

• My Sworkit:
- A new calendar view helps you track your workout streaks
- Easily view your Daily, Weekly, Monthly, Yearly, and all-time stats

• Sworkit Radio: Enjoy free workout music with fresh playlist updates each month

What's Improved:

• We've updated your workout settings to make it easier to input your preferences
• You can now access your workout settings via "Settings" in the app's navigation menu

Sworkit version 9.2.1 is helping you make fitness a habit with streaks, stats, and sounds.

What's New:
• My Sworkit:  A new calendar view helps you track your workout streaks . Easily view your Daily, Weekly, Monthly, Yearly, and all-time stats
• Sworkit Radio: Enjoy free workout music with fresh playlist updates each month
What's Improved:
• We've updated your workout settings to make it easier to input your preferences • You can now access your workout settings via "Settings" in the app's navigation menu

This has been a great year for new content in Sworkit. So far we've added over 50 new workouts and 100 new exercises including dumbbells, kettlebells, resistance bands, and even more bodyweight.

We've kept this new content trend going in July with 4 new workouts full of new bodyweight exercises to make sure you keep getting the variety you love. Here's what's new:

- Toning Core and Glutes (Strength)
- Full Body HIIT (Cardio)
- Intermediate Pilates (Yoga)
- Morning Stretch (Stretching)

Let us know what you'd like to see next!
Bug fixes and performance improvements

We've kept this going with 4 new workouts:

- Toning Core and Glutes (Strength)
- Full Body HIIT (Cardio)
- Intermediate Pilates (Yoga)
- Morning Stretch (Stretching)

Sworkit Kids video workouts now accessible at no cost! Parents and teachers can help their children and students create healthy fitness habits, all while having fun! Customizable kid-friendly workouts for strength, agility, and flexibility.

Please spread the word and help us in our ongoing mission to end childhood obesity.

New for iOS13:
- Dark Mode!

Have feedback? Email us at support@sworkit.com
